title: Costa Rica

elements.text: <p style="text-align: center"><span>Latest facts and figures about the global coffee trade from the International Coffee Organization.</span></p><p style="text-align: center">Last updated 08/02/2016</p>

data: Instituto del Café de Costa Rica (ICAFE)
and ICO statistics subscriptions visit our website at www.ico.org and click Statistics > Historical data or email us at library@ico.org
